title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Immersive VR-Based Cultural Understanding and English Learning: British Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners observe everyday British culture (e.g., transportation systems, café etiquette) in VR environments and explain it with over 80% accuracy.
Learners analyze and present three or more cultural backgrounds of literary works (e.g., *Around the World in 80 Days*) presented in the iVR London scenario.
Learners use target language expressions with over 70% fluency in role-plays (conversations, shopping, sightseeing) related to British culture based on VR experiences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
